sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const EventForm = ({ onAddEvent }) => { const [id, setId] = useState(''); const [title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [description, setDescription] = useState(''); const [image, setImage] = useState(null); const [date, setDate] = useState(''); const [hour, setHour] = useState(''); const [address, setAddress] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const newEvent = { id, title, description, imageUrl: URL.createObjectURL(image), date, hour, address, }; onAddEvent(newEvent); setId(''); setTitle(''); setDescription(''); setImage(null); setDate(''); setHour(''); setAddress(''); }; return ( <>

); }; export default EventForm;
